pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, October 6, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, joined by the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation and hold a media availability.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7518
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 5493615#
